1.0.name: wordpress/ip2phrase-widget
1.0.description:
A personalized welcome message can pleasantly suprise visitor while visiting your blog site. A simple message of "Hello buddy from Canada" can make a difference of how the react to your blog site. This is why the plugin was created for.

It enables you to display the visitors' IP Address, Country, Country-Code (2 digits), Region, City, ISP and the Country Flag icon from where they visited you blog site. Not only that, it allows you to customize your welcome message in any way you like. For example:

"Welcome, my friend from <CITY>, <COUNTRY>" will produce you "Welcome, my friend from Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia".

The <CITY> and <COUNTRY> are the example tag that you can use to display the location information, and it is pretty much up to you where you want them to be placed in your welcome message.

Below are the available tags

  • <IP> - IP address of visitor
  • <COUNTRY> - Full country name of
